      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties(String filename)
        Loads service requestor properties from a filename file. By default a service requestor loads its properties from requestor.properties file located in the requestor's package. Also, a service requestor properties file name can be specified as a system property when starting the requestor with -DrequestorProperties=<filename>. In this case the requestor loads properties from filename file. Properties are accessible calling the getProperty(String) method.
        Parameters:
        filename - the properties file name see #getProperty
